name: gamepad-plus
description: a superb library that extends the Gamepad API with super powers
author: Chris Van

scripts.dev: export NODE_ENVIRONMENT='development' && npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.build: if [[ $NODE_ENVIRONMENT == 'production' ]]; then echo export SOURCE_MAPS=0; else export SOURCE_MAPS=1; fi ; echo $SOURCE_MAPS && mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js --standalone Gamepads --debug=$SOURCE_MAPS -t babelify -o dist/gamepads.js
